name: Follower: Thassarian
description: Thassarian was a soldier of Lordaeron, serving under prince Arthas Menethil on the campaign to Northrend. He was slain by his former commmander, Falric, and reborn as a Death Knight in service to the Lich King.00After the battle of Light's Hope he departed to Stormwind to convince King Varian Wrynn to accept the Knights of the Ebon Blade as allies.00After spending some time serving in the armies of the Alliance he desires to fight once more for a greater cause and has returned to the Ebon Blade to join ther battle against the Legion.
